pages.text: The Pressurizer is a new multiblock made of titanium that can turn water into HP (high pressure) water, steam into HP steam, and the other way around.
Once you have access to HP water, you can use a High Pressure Large Steam Boiler to produce HP steam.$(br2)One millibucket of HP steam is worth 8 mb of regular steam, that is 8 EU.

To turn HP steam into energy, one option is to turn it into regular steam with a Pressurizer, and then feed it to an HV Steam Turbine. Like other HV generators, it will produce 512 EU/t.$(l)The HV turbine will NOT work with HP steam$().
You can also use a Large Steam Turbine! It will convert both regular steam (1 mb = 1 EU) and HP steam (1 mb = 8 EU) into EU, and will generate up to 4096 EU/t!
